title: Dianne Feinstein ‘Gunman’ Quote
subtitle: The California senator did not say that 'when a gunman realizes that nobody else is armed, he will lay down his weapons and turn himself in, that's human nature.'
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Senator Dianne Feinstein said "when the gunman realizes that nobody else is armed, he will lay down his weapons and turn himself in, that's human nature."
